sourcesContent:
import classes from './MealItem.module.css' import MealItemForm from './MealItemForm' import { useContext } from 'react' import CartContext from '../../../store/cart-context' const MealItem = props => { const cartCtx = useContext(CartContext) const addToCartHandler = amount => { cartCtx.addItem({ id: props.id, name: props.name, amount: amount, price: props.price }) } const price = `$${props.price.toFixed(2)}` return

  • {props.title}

    {props.description}
    {price}
    • } export default MealItem
